title: (x) Spa de Mar - Agenda {Chesh}
content:
Hi, I'm new here and you all seem to know a great deal so can you help with this: I'm looking for this font, I've found some similar (stone, charlotte, mixage) but really want this one! It's for a fashion magazine -- it needs to be contemporary and a little funky ... readable, lots of different weights and work well as titles and body text. I think this fits the bill really well. Of course I'll consider other options ...! Thanks in advance ... xxx

para ti font
parati (294.5 k)

[‹ (x) Tehnicni podatki - Akzidenz-Grotesk {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605055148/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5056 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Classic cadillac logo - custom (similar to English 157) {Mark S, Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605055148/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5050 "Go to next forum topic")
author: scarlettx

comments.content: Cally, I couldn't open the file. Could you re-upload it as an RGB JPG?

Wow, I do believe you're right, Dave!   
   
Thanks so much ... !

Also in the same Gill-meets-modern-humanist-sans:   
   
Today Sans, from Elsner + Flake
